projects.title: Battleship
projects.description: A battleships game created using React. This project used Test-Driven Development (TDD) as well as the HTML Drag and Drop API. These were two really interesting technologies to learn, and the build process was really rewarding.

projects.title: Machine Learning project in Python
projects.description: This study aims to explore different machine learning models which are trained on data of a humour questionnaire. From  this  study,  we  learnt  that  designing  models  formachine  learning  problems  can  be  extremely  difficult  and often complex. There are many different factors that affect how a model performs and optimising any model requires a vast understanding of how the algorithm works as well as how it could be improved.
